description: This file sets up a playground environment for Gemini agents, specifically creating a finance agent with associated tools and serving a web application.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent with a model and tools.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: Creates a playground environment for agents.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Returns the web application for the playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Serves the web application, optionally with reload.
